column6:
Fresh (4/2015) remodel of 3 bedroom 2 bath second floor condo. Balcony/window views of beach, dunes & pool.

5 beds (king, queen, 2 fulls and twin daybed) + packnplay can sleep up to 10. Elements of walnut, steel, mango wood and quartz bring nature indoors.

Rates include all applicable taxes.
